text: Yum. 😋 Noodle gravy has a good balance of lard and sauce that does not dilute it with oil. Rice is fragrant and chicken is well done.

Nice and authentic Thai chicken rice. The chilli and rice were great too!

The wanton noodles were also nicely cooked and taste Thai.
👍😋Very generous portion. Delicious 😋 Chicken Rice and Wanton Noodles. Remember to order the Crispy Wanton. Enjoyable. Very friendly Thai Boy, Ton. GOD Bless his business, Amen🙏
Ton just moved to this location. The chicken is so succulent & tasty & the rice is so flavourful. Highly recommended. Didn't managed to try the fried wonton which has good reviews too.
The fried wantons were excellent. Super crispy with generous fillings.
